full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, GLUD CHOG MCHOD SBYIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,('DI YANG DHARMA BADZRA GYIS, ,RTA MGRIN CHOS SKOR YAN LAG TU, ,SBYAR BA'I YI GE'I 'DU BYED MKHAN, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' YIN,, ,,SVA STI, TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR DE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,)
